item.title: Why does this webiste exist?
item.description: Hello there, welcome! You migth be wondering why does this corner of the web exist: let me try to answer the question. I had the idea of creating a personal page in the back of my mind for a long time, mostly because I wanted to establish a stronger online presence than my empty LinkedIn profile. I wanted something that could represent me better than a CV, but that also would require little maintenance on my side.
